summary.span: 表示 对象的有序集合。

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了前面所述，此类的成员的行为完全如 、和 文档所述。Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation. **冻结功能：** 因为它继承自 类，所以 类提供若干特殊功能： 对象可以声明为、在多个对象之间共享、变为只读以提高性能、克隆以及使线程安全。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 有关 对象提供的不同功能的详细信息，请参阅可[冻结对象概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview). ## XAML 隐式集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreDrawingObjectElements**oneOrMoreDrawingObjectElements* 一个或多个使用对象元素语法声明的 对象。One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.

summary.span: 返回一个可循环访问集合的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.

returns.span: 一个可循环访问集合的枚举数。

span.span: An enumerator that can iterate the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举器仅允许读取集合中的数据。Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection. 枚举器不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举器位于集合中第一项之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection. 在此位置，调用 会引发异常。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器前进到集合的第一项。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一项。 sets to the next item. 在传递集合的末尾之后，枚举数将定位到集合中的最后一项之后，并且调用 将返回 `false`。After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling returns `false`. 如果对的最后一个调用 返回 `false`，则调用 将引发异常。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一项，可以调用 后跟 。To set to the first item of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行了更改（如添加、修改或删除项），则枚举器将无法恢复，并且对 或 的下一次调用会引发 。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果在 和 之间修改集合， 将返回其设置为的项，即使枚举器已失效。If the collection is modified between and , will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合是同步的，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举器引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
